title: Residual current device (RCD)
fullText:
A device intended to isolate electrical supply to protected circuits, socket outlets or electrical equipment in the event of a current flow to earth that exceeds a predetermined value. The RCD may be a fixed RCD or a portable RCD (PRCD).
NOTE â€“Information on classifications can be found in AS/NZS 3190, AS/NZS 61008.1 and AS/NZS 61009.1.
